positions.comment: 7-17,  Presque Ise. Harbor.   Harrisville 7-18.
Harrisville-Lots of T-storms today, winds up to 42 kts and hard rain at times.
Anchored - Harbor Beach tonight, Lexington tomorrow.  Sailed 60 miles today.
Anchored Lexington 7/20, motored all day today.  Anchored Metro Beach 7/21/2005
Anchored Put In Bay 7/22, motored all day from Metro Beach, no wind, hot
7/24/2005 - Anchored Lorain OH, Sailed from Put in Bay.  Winds 20-30 kts.
7/24/2005 - Anchored Fairport, OH.  Motored from Lorain, OH
7/28/2005 -  Erie, PA.  after being weathered in at Fairport, OH for 3 days.
7/3128/2005 -  Erie, PA.  since 7/28 plan to go to Port Colborne 8/1
8/01/2005 -  Arrived Port Colborne, Plan transit of Welland Canal 8/03/2005
8/03/2005 -  Delayed transit of Welland Canal from Port Colborne until 8/04
8/04/2005 -  Transit Welland Canal  to Port Wellerl.  Now in Lake Ontario.
8/6/2005 -  Fast trip from Port Weller to Corburq, ON.  Wind 20-30 kts.
8/6/2005 -  Motored from  Corburg, ON to Sandy Cove in Quinte Bay.
8/76/2005 -  Sandy Cove to Pryners Cove, Quinte Bay ,ON.
Kingston, ON anchored in Confederaton Basin, Downtown Kingston-nice town
Anchored in Admiralty Islands (1000 Islands of St Lawreance River.
Anchored in Grenadier Isl.,St Lawreance River.
Crysler Park Marina, near Upper Canada Village.  Motored 44 miles
Anchored S side of Ile. Perrot in St Lawreance River Quebec.  Montreal tomorrow.
Arrived at Le Port de plaisance de Longueui, Montreal at about 3:00 pm.
8/15/05 Repentigny, ON-North Branch of St. Lawreance. Very Shallow
8/16/05 Chambley, ON-Mast on deck. Nice day.
8/18/05 Grand Isl. Vermont, LK Champlain, Back is U.S.- Motored 38 mi today
8/19/05 Burlington Vt, LK Champlain, Weather deterorating. May spend 1or2 days.
8/21/05  Anchored off Fort Ticoneeroga on lower Lk Champlain.
8/22/05  Tied up to city dock in Fort Edwards, NY on Champlain Canal.
8/25/05  Arrived at Casleton-On-The-Hudson about 6 P. M. Step mast tomorrow.
8/27/05  Mast stepped yesterday.  All went well. At Saugerties, NY at Anchor
8/28/05  At Poughkeepsie Yt Club mooring on the Hudson.  About 50 Miles to NYC.
8/29/05  At Nyack NY mooring on the Hudson.  About 17 M to NY.
8/30/05  At 79th str boat basin in NY on mooring on the Hudson. arv. 3:00 PM
9/1/05  Achd Oyster Bay, Long Island.  Went through Hell Gate on E River in NYC
9/2/05  Achd Port Jefferson, Long Island.  Short 25 mile trip from Oyster Bay
9/3/05  Achd  Sag Harbor, Long Island.  60 mile trip from Port Jefferson
9/6/05  Rafted to another Saga 43 in Mystic, CT.  30 miles today
9/14/05  Left Mstic, CT.  30 miles today.  Anchored at Westbrook, CT.
9/15/05  Anchored at Port Jefferson, NY.  Back to Oyster Bay, NY tomorrow.
9/16/05  Anchored at Oyster, NY.  Will probably stay a couple days.
9/16/05  Anchored at Atlantic Highlands. Plan to leave for Cape May soon.
9/20/05  Anchored at Cape May. Left Atlantic Highlands yesterday at 10:30 A. M.
9/22/05  Anchored at Chesapeake City. Left Cape May this morning.
9/24/05  Anchored at Georgetown, MD on Sassafras river.
9/25/05 Arived Annapolis, MD.  Picked up a Naval Academy Mooring on Weems river.
10/17/05 Arived Solomons lsland, MD.  Left Annapolis after a 3 week stay.
